title: Gucci’s Milan Runway Show, in Watercolor
text:
Illustration: Samantha Hahn

Alessandro Michele closed out Milan Fashion Week with a surprising — and surprisingly delightful — change of pace at Gucci’s Milan headquarters. Gucci staples were given serious edge: maxi dresses with sheer panels, granny glasses with thick chains, revealing cutouts, and just plain straightjackets. Even the eyelashes were provocative. Despite the feints toward perversity, Michele’s designs retained a touch of androgyny. All in all, it made for one of the most brilliant shows of the week.

Here, see our favorite looks from the show, illustrated by Samantha Hahn.

Illustration: Samantha Hahn
description: Artist Samantha Hahn has taken our favorite looks from Gucci’s spring/summer 2020 runway show at Milan Fashion Week and turned them into gorgeous watercolors.
